member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetNextWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to get the next working time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetPreviousWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to get the previous working time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetNextVisibleTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions. If the resulting date and time cannot be less than TimelinePageFinish, then TimelinePageFinish is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the next visible time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetPreviousVisibleTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions. If the resulting date and time cannot be greater than TimelinePageStart, then TimelinePageStart is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the previous visible time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetNextNonworkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a nonworking time, determined based on the time not included in the working week and working day definitions, or included in the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to get the previous nonworking time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a nonworking time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetPreviousNonworkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a nonworking time, determined based on the time not included in the working week and working day definitions, or included in the defined nonworking time intervals. If the resulting date and time cannot be less than TimelinePageFinish, then TimelinePageFinish is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the next visible nonworking time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a nonworking time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetWorkingTimeIntervals(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Iterates the working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to iterate from.
The date and time to iterate to.
member.returns: The working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetUpdateScaleTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the rounded date and time for the specified date and time based on the defined update scale time interval.
member.param: The date and time to get the update scale time for.
member.returns: The rounded date and time for the specified date and time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetEffort(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the total duration of the working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times (i.e. effort time for a task that starts and finishes on specified date and time, considering a single full time resource assignment), determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The start date and time of the working time intervals.
The finish date and time of the working time intervals.
member.returns: The total duration of the working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetFinish(System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets the finish date and time of a working time interval that starts at the specified date and time and has the specified total effort duration (possibly interrupted, and considering a single full time resource assignment), determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The start date and time of the working time interval.
The total effort duration of the working time interval.
member.returns: The finish date and time of the working time interval that starts at the specified date and time and has the specified total effort duration.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetStart(System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the start date and time of a working time interval that has the specified total effort duration (possibly interrupted, and considering a single full time resource assignment) and finishes at the specified date and time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The total effort duration of the working time interval.
The finish date and time of the working time interval.
member.returns: The start date and time of the working time interval that has the specified total effort duration and finishes at the specified date and time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetPosition(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the horizontal coordinate in the chart for the specified date and time. The output value may be negative if the date time is less than TimelinePageStart, or higher than ComputedWidth if the date time is greater than TimelinePageFinish.

member.returns: The horizontal coordinate in the chart for the specified date and time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.IGanttChartView.GetDateTime(System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the date and time for the specified horizontal coordinate in the chart. The output value may be less than TimelinePageStart if the position is negative, or greater than TimelinePageFinish if the position is higher than ComputedWidth.
member.param: The position to get the date and time for.
member.returns: The date and time for the specified horizontal coordinate in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetNextWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to get the next working time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetPreviousWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The date and time to get the previous working time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetNextVisibleTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions. If the resulting date and time cannot be less than TimelinePageFinish, then TimelinePageFinish is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the next visible time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetPreviousVisibleTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions. If the resulting date and time cannot be greater than TimelinePageStart, then TimelinePageStart is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the previous visible time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetNextVisibleWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a working time, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions, and working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals. If the resulting date and time cannot be less than TimelinePageFinish, then TimelinePageFinish is returned.
member.param: The date and time to get the next visible working time for.
member.returns: The minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetPreviousVisibleWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a working time, determined based on the visible week and visible day definitions, and working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals. member.param: The date and time to get the previous visible working time for.
member.returns: The maximum date and time less or equal than the specified date and time that is visible in the chart and considered as a working time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetEffort(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the total duration of the working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times (i.e. effort time for a task that starts and finishes on specified date and time, considering a single full time resource assignment), determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The start date and time of the working time intervals.
The finish date and time of the working time intervals.
member.returns: The total duration of the working time intervals between specified start and finish date and times.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetFinish(System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets the finish date and time of a working time interval that starts at the specified date and time and has the specified total effort duration (possibly interrupted, and considering a single full time resource assignment), determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The start date and time of the working time interval.
The total effort duration of the working time interval.
member.returns: The finish date and time of the working time interval that starts at the specified date and time and has the specified total effort duration.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetStart(System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the start date and time of a working time interval that has the specified total effort duration (possibly interrupted, and considering a single full time resource assignment) and finishes at the specified date and time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.
member.param: The total effort duration of the working time interval.
The finish date and time of the working time interval.
member.returns: The start date and time of the working time interval that has the specified total effort duration and finishes at the specified date and time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetPosition(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the horizontal coordinate in the chart for the specified date and time. The output value may be negative if the date time is less than TimelinePageStart, or higher than ComputedWidth if the date time is greater than TimelinePageFinish.
member.param: The date and time to get the position for.
member.returns: The horizontal coordinate in the chart for the specified date and time.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartDataGrid.GetDateTime(System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the date and time for the specified horizontal coordinate in the chart. The output value may be less than TimelinePageStart if the position is negative, or greater than TimelinePageFinish if the position is higher than ComputedWidth.
member.param: The position to get the date and time for.
member.returns: The date and time for the specified horizontal coordinate in the chart.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartView.GetNextWorkingTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the minimum date and time greater or equal than the specified date and time that is considered as a working time, determined based on the working week and working day definitions, excluding the defined nonworking time intervals.

member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a time of day to its TimeOfDay equivalent.
member.param: A string containing a time of day to convert.

When this method returns, contains the TimeOfDay value equivalent to the time of day contained in , if the conversion succeeded, or MinValue if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), or does not contain a valid string representation of a time of day. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
